title: Stalked by a Reality Star
description: A teenage girl lies about her age to get into a Hollywood party and meets a handsome reality TV star - but when she finds out he is a creep and rejects him, he becomes obsessed and starts ...

title: Rock Star: INXS
description: Reality competition show looking for a new lead singer for the rock group INXS

title: Jade: The Reality Star Who Changed Britain
description: Series exploring the life of Jade Goody: the UK's most loved - and hated - reality TV star.

title: I Know My Kid's a Star
description: A reality series in which a group of kids (and their parents) compete in order to be deemed the next child star.

title: Mission Star
description: A delivery boy from a grocery store gets the dream opportunity of participating in his favorite reality show.

title: The Young Person's Guide to Becoming a Rock Star
description: An up-and-coming Glasgow based rock band are faced the harsh realities of the music industry on their journey to becoming the next big thing.

title: Ich bin ein Star - Holt mich hier raus!
description: I'm a Celebrity - Get Me Out of Here. (often referred to as a jungle camp) is a reality show that has been aired by the RTL since 2004.

title: Rising Star
description: Rising Star is an Indian version of the international franchise series Rising Star. It is a reality television singing competition. The program format lets viewers vote for contestants live...

title: Date My Porn Star
description: Three British porn addicts, Kevin, 20, Danny, 26, and Jonathan, 40, go to America to meet their favourite stars, and witness the harsh realities behind the factories of fantasy.

title: HGTV Design Star
description: Ten aspiring designers seek to impress home viewers and an expert judging panel with their design expertise, ingenuity, creativity and "it" factor during the reality competition, HGTV Design Star.
